titleStmt.title: By the Kynge and the Quene wheras the King & Quenes maiesties heretofore cõmaunded & caused certaine monies to be coynned and sent into the realme of Irelande for the seruyce and vse of the sayd realme ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Ioannis Cawodi Tipographi Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Rose pence of Ireland not current in England.
Includes ms. notes in Latin at bottom of sheet.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
